page.title: 11SHEPHERD'S HOUSE,ROXWELL
page.content: On the 27th June we went to {'Shepherds'}which is near{Skreens {Park.}It is the old Shepherd's cottage. It looks very nice from the outside.The owner opened the door and we went in. Inside the house it was very cool and it had lots of wooden bars across the ceiling. The ceiling was quite low. In the kitchen it looked like an old stable because it had 2 stable doors one leading into the kitchen and one going out. His wife does the {shopping}at Chelmsford. When we got there she wasn't in. She was shopping for some food for their holiday to Portugal. The owner's best{hobby}is gardening. He has built a swimming pool and a barbecue. At 12.00 they were going to Portugal so we went back to the car and said,"Thanks".
